channel.title: CVE Feed for Unknown -- Advanced Cron Manager
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Unknown -- Advanced Cron Manager

item.title: CVE-2021-25084|2024-08-03T19:56:09.878Z -- unknown -- advanced%20cron%20manager
item.description: The Advanced Cron Manager WordPress plugin before 2.4.2 and Advanced Cron Manager Pro WordPress plugin before 2.5.3 do not have authorisation checks in some of their AJAX actions, allowing any authenticated users, such as subscriber to call them and add or remove events as well as schedules for example
